# Prerequisites

We will use these R packages in this book.

```{r eval=FALSE}
install.packages(c("quanteda", "rio", "stm", "tidyverse", "text2vec"))
```

The data used in this book is available in this book's github repo: [https://github.com/chainsawriot/automatedcontentanalysis/tree/master/data](https://github.com/chainsawriot/automatedcontentanalysis/tree/master/data)
